statements: SELECT * FROM celebrity_inventory;
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_quantity FROM celebrity_inventory ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_price FROM celebrity_inventory WHERE item_price > 100;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity, item_price FROM celebrity_inventory ORDER BY item_quantity ASC, item_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM celebrity_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Accessories';
SELECT * FROM celebrity_inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM celebrity_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Accessories';
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM celebrity_inventory ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM celebrity_inventory WHERE item_price >= 100 ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT COUNT(item_id) AS total_items, SUM(item_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM celebrity_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM accessory_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, size, category FROM clothing_inventory WHERE size = 'M';
SELECT id, item_name, material FROM accessory_inventory;
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM clothing_inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, category FROM accessory_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM clothing_inventory WHERE category = 'Shirt' AND size IN ('S', 'M', 'L') ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, material FROM accessory_inventory WHERE material != 'Leather' AND quantity > 5 LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, size, COUNT(*) AS num_items FROM clothing_inventory GROUP BY category, size HAVING num_items > 2 ORDER BY num_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT item_name, item_color, item_price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Shirt';
SELECT item_name, item_size FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_color = 'Blue' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_price > 50.00;
SELECT stylist_name, stylist_specialty FROM stylist_inventory WHERE stylist_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_type, item_color, item_price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Shirt' AND item_color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM accessory_inventory WHERE accessory_type = 'Necklace' AND accessory_price > 50 ORDER BY accessory_price DESC;
SELECT stylist_name, stylist_specialty, stylist_location FROM stylist_inventory WHERE stylist_contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_name, item_color, item_price, accessory_name, accessory_color, accessory_price FROM clothing_inventory JOIN accessory_inventory ON item_color = accessory_color;
SELECT item_name, brand, price FROM clothing;
SELECT accessory_name, quantity FROM accessories WHERE price > 50;
SELECT stylist_name, agency, contact_info FROM stylist ORDER BY stylist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM stylist_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY stylist_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, brand, price FROM clothing WHERE brand = 'Nike';
SELECT * FROM clothing ORDER BY item_name DESC, price ASC
SELECT item_name, brand, price FROM clothing WHERE brand = 'Nike' AND quantity > 10
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM clothing WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT c.item_name, s.stylist_name FROM clothing c JOIN stylist_inventory si ON c.item_id = si.item_id JOIN stylist s ON si.stylist_id = s.stylist_id
SELECT c.item_name, c.brand, si.quantity FROM clothing c LEFT JOIN stylist_inventory si ON c.item_id = si.item_id AND si.quantity > 0 ORDER BY c.item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT item_name, designer, price FROM clothing_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, designer, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE designer = 'Gucci';
SELECT stylist_name, experience_years, agency FROM stylist;

SELECT stylist_name, item_name FROM stylist JOIN stylist_clothing_connections ON stylist.stylist_id = stylist_clothing_connections.stylist_id JOIN clothing_inventory ON stylist_clothing_connections.item_id = clothing_inventory.item_id;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT item_name, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT stylist_name, experience_years FROM stylist ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, material FROM accessory_inventory WHERE material LIKE 'Leather%';
SELECT c.item_name, s.stylist_name FROM stylist_clothing_connections sc JOIN clothing_inventory c ON c.item_id = sc.item_id JOIN stylist s ON s.stylist_id = sc.stylist_id;
